description:
Hameline is defeated by General Torque, "the Beast." The enraged Seth continues to fight, but Von Teppes of the Inquisition turns the tables on him. Seth finally loses consciousness, but then an immense hidden power he didn`t know he had sends him on a rampage. He defeats Teppes and, still unconscious, goes after Torque. The battle grows even more intense as Colonel Santori jumps in to assist Torque. Then, as Melie and Grimm attempt to flee the town, a ride appears for them from Artemis courtesy of Majesty himself...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Après les ténèbres vient la lumière
The Light That Follows the Darkness: Awakening
Yami no Ato no Hikari: Awakening
